name: War of Omens - A Digital Deck-Builder/CCG, BACKER BETA LIVE!
blurb: War of Omens is a card game combining deck-builder and CCG mechanics, featuring fast, strategic play and 3 different playable factions.

rewards.reward: No Reward
Thanks for backing War of Omens!  We really appreciate it.

The Youngling\r\n=============================\r\nBeta access to War of Omens, a Beta Tester forum badge, and a digital War of Omens art bundle with backgrounds, card art, and assets perfectly sized for Facebook, Twitter, etc.

The Early Adopter (LIMITED TIER)\r\n==============================\r\nEARLY ADOPTER DEAL.  Save $5 on the normal price of The Elementalist (10 premium boosters, $25 in premium currency, a Kickstarter-exclusive Backer card, plus everything in The Youngling)
The Elementalist\r\n==============================\r\n10 premium boosters, $25 in premium currency, a Kickstarter-exclusive backer card, plus everything in the Youngling.

The Vespitole Starter\r\n==============================\r\nA Vespitole starter card pack and everything in The Elementalist (but with 20 gem packs and $40 premium currency).  If more people choose the Vespitole starter than any other starter, we'll enhance the Vespitole starter with a winners-only hero skin!

The Metris Starter\r\n==============================\r\nA Metris starter card pack, and everything in The Elementalist (but with 20 gem packs and $40 premium currency).  If more people choose the Metris starter than any other starter, we'll enhance the Metris starter with a winners-only hero skin!

The Daramek Starter\r\n==============================\r\nA Daramek starter card pack, and everything in The Elementalist (but with 20 gem packs and $40 premium currency). If more people choose the Daramek starter than any other starter, we'll enhance the Daramek starter with a winners-only hero skin!

The Artist\r\n=============================\r\nDigital art book, soundtrack, starter card pack for the faction of your choice (Vespitole, Daramek, or Metris, plus a tally for the contest), plus everything in the Starter tier (but with 30 premium boosters and $55 premium currency).

The Triple Threat: Early Adopter\r\n=============================\r\nLIMITED TIER: Save $10 on the price of the Triple Threat (all three starter card packs, all cards available in Kickstarter-Exclusive Silver Foil, plus everything The Artist (but with 40 premium boosters and $80 premium currency).

The Triple Threat\r\n=============================\r\nAll three starter card packs, all cards available in Kickstarter-Exclusive Silver Foil, plus everything The Artist (but with 40 premium boosters and $80 premium currency).

The Gifter
=============================
An additional 5 beta keys, a Kickstarter-Exclusive Hero Card, a War of Omens logo t-shirt, plus everything in The Triple Threat (but with 50 premium boosters and $100 premium currency).
=============================
All backer levels above $100 will receive special "venerated backer" card back skins, plus a special mention in the credits.

The Collector\r\n=============================\r\nAll cards in the game unlocked, and available in Kickstarter-Exclusive Gold Foil, plus everything in The Gifter (but with 75 premium boosters and $150 in premium currency).
The Librarian\r\n=============================\r\nHardbound War of Omens art book, plus everything in The Collector (but with 100 premium boosters and $200 in premium currency).

The Patron ============================= Colin Adams, Fifth Column Games' art director, has 30 final card drawings, done just before the final ink and color treatment. You'll get one of these drawings, signed, framed, and mailed to you, plus everything in The Librarian (but 125 premium boosters and $250 premium currency).

The Patron\r\n=============================\r\nColin Adams, Fifth Column Games' art director, has 30 concept sketches that he did early in War of Omens' development.  You'll get one of these sketches, signed, framed, and mailed to you, plus everything in The Luminary (but 125 premium boosters and $250 premium currency).
The Superfriend\r\n=============================\r\n2x of The Librarian tier; one for you, and one for a friend (that friend can be you; we totally won't judge).

The Luminary\r\n=============================\r\nHardcover art book signed by all of the War of Omens artists, plus an invitation (+1) to our War of Omens launch party in San Francisco (travel and accommodations not provided), plus everything in The Superfriend.

The Doppleganger
==============================
A unique hero crafted for you, with a custom ability and your likeness.  No one else will have this hero but you, and everyone will see it. Plus, everything in The Luminary.
=============================
All backer levels above $1000 will receive special "illustrious backer" card back skins with animated particle effects, plus a special mention in the credits.

The Villain\r\n=============================\r\nWe'll work with you to incorporate your likeness into the game as a villain or NPC that everyone will see.  You'll get the resulting art, signed and framed at poster size, plus everything from The Luminary.

Are You a God?
=============================
Your name becomes the word for "God" in our game.  Your face will be stamped on currency in-game.  When children cry in the night, it will be because they fear you.  Plus, everything in The Luminary.
=============================
The "Are You a God" tier will receive special "godly backing" card back skins with animated particle effects, plus an Executive Producer  credit.
